file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-40-01-06 - LAVATORY - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LAVATORY - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to inspect the lavatory waste disposal door. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY LAVATORY WASTE DISPOSAL DOOR - ALL 25-40-01-200-801-A ♦ INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-40-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-40-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LAVATORY WASTE DISPOSAL DOOR - INSPECTION A. General (1) The function of this inspection is to make sure that the lavatory waste disposal door operates correctly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION IPC 25-40-01 LAVATORY C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) To do the detailed inspection of the lavatory waste disposal door, have a direct source of good lighting to make the lighting conditions in the lavatory better. J. Inspection (Detailed Inspection) of the Lavatory Waste Disposal Door SUBTASK 220-002-A (1) Do a detailed inspection of the attaching parts which attach the lavatory waste disposal door as follows (Figure 601): (a) Examine the lavatory waste disposal door for general condition, easily seen degradation, crack, corrosion, damage and failure. (b) Examine the springs, waste deflectors and flap attachments for general conditions, easily seen degradation, crack, corrosion, damage and failure. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 25-40-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (c) Close and open the lavatory waste disposal door two or three times to make sure that it operates correctly. (d) Make sure that the springs permit the correct closing and opening operation of the lavatory waste disposal door. (2) Replace the defective parts (IPC 25-40-01). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 25-40-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
